[b][color=white]HF Octoberfest 2021[/color][/b]
Octoberfest 2021 [award=163] award is now live and all it takes is 500 posts in the month of October to reach the goal. You have until November 10th to claim the award. We also have a new Hackuman monster, Vice, in the coming weeks. The donation awards have been rotated and we now have the Emerald Heart [award=162] for $25 and Ruby Heart [award=161] for $500.[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174771]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Member of the Month - September[/color][/b]
Our September's MotM is [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4899375][color=#00feb0]guardian[/color][/url]. Congratulations![i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174806] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=White]Vacations, Bans & Closures[/color][/b]
[list]
[*]No vacations, bans & closures news for this week!
[/list]


[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://i.imgur.com/uvrVZ20.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174771][b]HF Octoberfest 2021[/b][/url] - Omniscient
This year, Halloween comes with a new award. Head on over to your favorite subforums and start posting. Once you hit 500 posts, you will be eligible for the Octoberfest 2021 award. While you are at it, make sure to check out the events that Warriors are hosting!

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174406][b]New HUM[/b][/url] - Omniscient
Have you met Vise? He shall be the latest addition to the Hackúman game, where players battle it out with one another in an attempt to get to the top. Be sure to vote on the poll and let Omniscient know which style you prefer.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174806][b]September 2021 Member of the Month is guardian[/b][/url] - Stanley
We have got a brand-new member to the member of the month club. The member known as guardian has been named the member of the month of September 2021. Have you congratulated them yet? If not then make sure you go and show your support in this thread.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6173857][b][TuT] How to Deposit and Withdraw your bytes using HF API[/b][/url] - Jinu
Do you have a bytes gambling addiction? Perhaps you need somewhere to hide your bytes? Jinu has created a guide on how to utilize the Hack Forums API to create your own bank vault.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174437][b]Currency Exchanging for Profit || Guide/Help Desk[/b][/url] - Parks
Most people will deal with crypto at one point or another, often to spend it purchasing a product or a service. The bold might even sell cryptocurrency. If you are interested in making a living from exchanging between coins, check out Parks' guide, you could even ask a question on his help desk!
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6170720][b]Warriors: Month of Madness[/b][/url] - Sky
The official Hack Forums group Warriors are hosting a series of fun events to celebrate Octoberfest. Whether you want to take part in the Hack Forums trivia, or just want a chance to win an upgrade, be sure to check it out.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174823][b]Congratulations to flavoral on being the first to earn the Octoberfest Pumpkin award![/b][/url] - Cooligan
The Octoberfest award requires a user to make 500 posts throughout October. For many, this will take weeks, but for flavoral, it took a day. When the reward was released, he racked up 500 posts to be the first to get the award, shortly followed by Demize. Congratulations.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6173223][b]PinkCraft | Open for Everyone![/b][/url] - Zero
Do you play Minecraft? Pink LSZ has launched their very own Minecraft server for all of the Hack Forums community to play on. Have fun with your friends and create something incredible!
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6174734][b][Lions League] 100k Bytes Contest | Open To Everyone | 6 Winners | Ends 01-11-21[/b][/url] - Red Sox
Lions League is back with the eighth installment to their series of monthly contests. This time, there are 100,000 bytes up for grabs, split among 6 different winners.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6172514][b]Loadman's giveaway [150$ BTC] [EVERYONE] 2 WINNERS|ends10 days||every 24hrs entry[/b][/url] - loadman
Do you want to be in with a chance of winning some money? loadman is giving away $75 each to two lucky winners. Anyone can enter, and all you have to do is leave a post.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]
